thread.title: Deepika Padukone is feeling sad in new 'Tamasha' song
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone is feeling sad in new 'Tamasha' song - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Deepika Padukone is feeling sad in new 'Tamasha' song
text:
The latest song 'Heer toh badi sad hai' from Imtiaz Ali's Tamasha is out.
Looking sad and lost in the number, Deepika Padukone is visibly upset even as the world tries to cheer her up.
Sung by Mika, the song, composed by AR Rahman, has a feel good vibe about it.
WATCH: Heer toh badi sad hai
